title: Winners and Washouts: Ranking the Hits and Misses of the Season’s Biggest Transfers
content:
Breaking down the highs and lows of cycling’s biggest transfer moves in 2024, and what's in store for 2025 in cycling's never-end game of musical chairs.

Read the full article at Winners and Washouts: Ranking the Hits and Misses of the Season’s Biggest Transfers on Velo.
author: ahood
